titles.title: For the relief of Web's Construction Company, Incorporated.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration, Border Security, and Claims.

bill.summary: 5/25/2005--Introduced. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay Web's Construction Company, Incorporated, a specified sum plus interest for construction work performed for the Army Corps of Engineers.
